tools.name: pdf_to_text
tools.description: Extract text content from a PDF file. Returns extracted text with metadata. Use this to preprocess PDF documents before translation.

pdf_path.description: Absolute path to the PDF file to extract text from

output_path.description: Optional path to write the extracted text. If provided, text is written to file instead of returned in response.

format.description: Output format: 'text' for plain text (default), 'markdown' for structured markdown with headers and formatting (requires pymupdf4llm)

pages.description: Optional list of page numbers to extract (0-indexed). If not provided, all pages are extracted.
